metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9378 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Ettercap 0.8.1 does not validate certain return values, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted (1) name to the parse_line function in mdns_spoof/mdns_spoof.c or (2) base64 encoded password to the dissector_imap function in dissectors/ec_imap.c.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9378` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ettercap-common - 1:0.8.1-3
ettercap-graphical - 1:0.8.1-3
ettercap-text-only - 1:0.8.1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ettercap package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:0.8.1-3').
